content: >http://www.thestar.com/News/World/article/600284 Talk about 'bringing them to justice'. 65 years after he was a guard st Sobibor concentration camp, John Demjanjuk, who is now deportable, may be facing a German court charged being an accessory to the murder of 29 000 persons of the Jewish faith. That 'war crime' stuff can have longer legs than a terrorism charge. This message has been edited. Last edited by: popsiq, Fri 13 March 2009 06:19 PM

content: quote: Originally posted by popsiq: >http://www.thestar.com/News/World/article/600284 Talk about 'bringing them to justice'. 65 years after he was a guard st Sobibor concentration camp, John Demjanjuk, who is now deportable, may be facing a German court charged being an accessory to the murder of 29 000 persons of the Jewish faith. That 'war crime' stuff can have longer legs than a terrorism charge. i have to wonder... a GUARD? 26 thousand people? why does this feel like leaning the full force of the crime on one man? Dobibor was a terrible camp, even after the escape, but i find it hard to believe he killed all of those poor souls

title: Demjanjuk Charged with 29 000 Cases of Murder

content: He neednt be the trigger puller to be charged as an accessory An accessory, in the context of criminal law, is a person who helps in the commission of a crime, such as by commanding the crime, driving the getaway car, providing the weapons, assisting in the planning, providing an alibi, or hiding the main offender after the crime. The accessory may or may not be present during the crime, but must be aware that the crime is going to be committed or has been committed. A principal offender cannot also be an accessory. The punishment for an accessory is usually lighter than for the principal offender. A criminal charge of aiding and abetting or accessory can usually be brought against anyone who helps in the commission of a crime, though legal distinctions vary by state. XXXhttp://definitions.uslegal.com/a/accessory/XXX This guy is slippery. He was extradited to Israel, tried & Convicted of being one man. The Israeli Supreme court released him after compelling evidence showed he wasnt the man who did those Crimes. Germany was ready to try him recently and requested he be extradited
